name: Solitaire: Classic Card Games
description:
PLAY NOW! 10000000 Players!

Challenge your brain everyday by completing one of the most classic card games.

Features of Solitaire Games:
- Play unlimited games for free! No lives!
- Solitare draw 1 card
- Solitare draw 3 cards
- Cards are easy to read
- Tap on a card or drag a card to move it
- Automatically save your best time and your total wins!
